content: the **iris placemat** is a simple yet modern addition to your dining table **the pattern is available as a hobbii plus design here 1 ** the pattern is simple enough for advanced beginners as the easy repetitive row are perfect for mindless crocheting it works up quick using the suggested yarn but you can use any color you desire the possibilites are endless the pattern is **free on my blog here 2 ** or if you click on visit pattern website above also you can dowload an ad free pdf version from my ravelry store for a small fee **special thanks to my testers ** *mirjam annaars cheryl freeman zannah söderlind* **difficulty ** advanced beginner **size ** 30 x 43 cm/ 12 x 17 **materials needed ** 6 mm j size hook **cascata** by hobbii niagara 06 80 grams * 160 m/175 yards * yarn needle for weaving in ends scissors stitch markers * optional * **us terms** used throughout **no chart/diagram available ** i hope you ll love it as much as i loved creating it ***happy crocheting *** *krisztina* 1 http //www mnpa6gtrk com/9wwwbf2/g2dw3lf/ uid=10085 2 https //kamecrochet com/2024/03/21/iris-placemat-a-crocheted-table-setting/
